duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Store Manager with oversight of the Stationstore operations, including hiring, supervising, and working with staff to accomplish daily tasks, bookkeeping, and merchandising.
Maintain high standards and provide fast and friendly service to customers, and execute the food program.
Lead a team of employees/management, recruit, interview, and hire staff, delegate and follow-up, teach and motivate others, communicate plans and ideas, and handle cash-handling and bookkeeping.
Advocate for safety and security, and ensure regular and predictable onsite attendance.
